subtasks.testStrategy: Performance benchmarks comparing sequential vs parallel generation across different dataset sizes. Memory and resource usage monitoring during large batch operations. Stress tests with maximum task set sizes to identify performance bottlenecks.

tasks.title: Optimize Event Emitter with Lazy Listener Registration
tasks.description: Implement lazy listener registration and automatic cleanup in task domain event systems to reduce memory overhead and improve performance
tasks.details: Review event emitter usage in packages/tm-core/src/modules/tasks/domains/ and implement lazy listener registration. Only register event listeners when first subscriber attaches. Implement automatic cleanup when last listener is removed. Add listener lifecycle tracking and memory usage monitoring. Maintain existing event functionality while reducing baseline memory consumption.
tasks.testStrategy: Memory profiling before/after optimization. Unit tests for listener lifecycle management. Integration tests ensuring event propagation still works correctly. Performance tests for event emission overhead.

subtasks.title: Analyze Event Emitter Usage in Task Domain
subtasks.description: Review and catalog all event emitter usage patterns in packages/tm-core/src/modules/tasks/domains/ and related workflow components to understand current listener registration behavior and memory implications
subtasks.details: Examine WorkflowOrchestrator.ts, WorkflowActivityLogger.ts, and other task domain files to identify event emission patterns, listener registration timing, and current memory consumption. Document baseline event listener counts and memory usage patterns. Identify opportunities for lazy registration where listeners are registered immediately but could be deferred until first subscription.
subtasks.testStrategy: Create memory profiling snapshots before optimization. Document current event listener registration patterns and timing. Establish baseline metrics for memory consumption and listener counts.

subtasks.title: Design Lazy Listener Registration Architecture
subtasks.description: Design the lazy listener registration system architecture with listener lifecycle tracking and automatic cleanup capabilities
subtasks.details: Create design for lazy listener registration system that defers event listener registration until first subscriber attaches. Design listener lifecycle tracking to count active subscriptions and automatically cleanup when last listener is removed. Define interfaces for lazy event emitters, subscription counting, and cleanup triggers. Include memory usage monitoring hooks and metrics collection.
subtasks.testStrategy: Design validation through architecture review. Unit tests for subscription counting logic. Integration tests for listener lifecycle management. Memory profiling tests to verify lazy registration reduces baseline consumption.

subtasks.title: Implement Lazy Event Emitter Base Class
subtasks.description: Implement the core lazy event emitter functionality with subscription tracking and automatic listener lifecycle management
subtasks.details: Create LazyEventEmitter base class or mixin that wraps standard EventEmitter functionality. Implement subscription counting (track number of active listeners per event type). Add lazy registration logic that only registers internal listeners when first external subscriber attaches. Implement automatic cleanup that removes internal listeners when last external subscriber is removed. Include memory usage monitoring and metrics collection.
subtasks.testStrategy: Unit tests for subscription counting accuracy. Tests for lazy registration timing (listeners only added when needed). Tests for automatic cleanup when last subscriber removes. Memory usage tests comparing baseline consumption before/after lazy implementation.

subtasks.title: Integrate Lazy Listeners in WorkflowOrchestrator
subtasks.description: Update WorkflowOrchestrator to use lazy listener registration while maintaining all existing event functionality and backward compatibility
subtasks.details: Modify WorkflowOrchestrator to extend or use LazyEventEmitter functionality. Update event listener registration in WorkflowActivityLogger to work with lazy registration system. Ensure all existing event types ('workflow:started', 'phase:entered', 'tdd:red:started', etc.) continue to work correctly. Maintain backward compatibility with existing event listener code. Add memory usage monitoring specific to workflow event systems.
subtasks.testStrategy: Integration tests ensuring all existing workflow events still fire correctly. Tests for WorkflowActivityLogger compatibility with lazy registration. Backward compatibility tests for existing event listener code. Memory profiling showing reduced baseline consumption while maintaining functionality.

subtasks.title: Add Memory Monitoring and Performance Validation
subtasks.description: Implement comprehensive memory monitoring for event emitter optimizations and validate performance improvements with benchmarks
subtasks.details: Add memory usage monitoring hooks throughout the lazy event emitter system. Create performance benchmarks comparing memory consumption before/after optimization. Implement listener lifecycle metrics (registration counts, cleanup events, memory saved). Add performance validation tests that verify event emission overhead hasn't increased significantly. Create monitoring dashboard or logging for memory usage patterns in production.
subtasks.testStrategy: Memory profiling benchmarks before/after optimization showing reduced baseline consumption. Performance tests ensuring event emission speed hasn't regressed. Stress tests with many event subscriptions/unsubscriptions. Integration tests verifying memory cleanup occurs correctly in real workflow scenarios.

tasks.title: Optimize Template Processing with Compiled Regex Patterns
tasks.description: Implement single-pass template variable substitution with compiled regex patterns and variable caching for template processing
tasks.details: Optimize template processing in packages/tm-core/src/modules/ by implementing compiled regex patterns for variable substitution. Create template compilation cache for repeated template usage. Replace multiple-pass regex operations with single-pass processing. Add performance benchmarks for template processing operations with varying complexity levels.
tasks.testStrategy: Performance benchmarks comparing multi-pass vs single-pass processing. Unit tests for template compilation accuracy. Integration tests ensuring template output correctness. Edge case testing for complex nested templates.

subtasks.title: Create CompiledRegex class for template pattern optimization
subtasks.description: Implement a CompiledRegex class that pre-compiles regular expressions for template variable substitution and conditional block processing to eliminate repeated regex compilation overhead
subtasks.details: Create a new CompiledRegex class in packages/tm-core/src/modules/git/services/ that pre-compiles regex patterns for variable substitution (\{\{\s*([^}#/\s]+)\s*\}\}) and conditional blocks (\{\{#([^}]+)\}\}...\{\{\/\1\}\}). Include pattern caching, match optimization, and performance monitoring methods. This will eliminate the regex compilation overhead currently present in substituteVariables() and processConditionalBlocks() methods.
subtasks.testStrategy: Unit tests for regex compilation accuracy and performance benchmarks measuring compilation time vs execution time improvements

subtasks.title: Implement template compilation cache with LRU eviction
subtasks.description: Add template compilation caching to TemplateEngine using LRU strategy to store compiled templates and avoid repeated parsing and compilation of the same templates
subtasks.details: Extend TemplateEngine class with a template compilation cache using the existing LRUCacheStrategy. Cache compiled template objects that include pre-compiled regex patterns, extracted variables, and processed conditional blocks. Implement cache key generation based on template content hash. Add cache hit/miss metrics and configure appropriate TTL and memory limits. Integrate with the CompiledRegex class from subtask 1.
subtasks.testStrategy: Cache hit/miss ratio tests, memory usage monitoring, and performance benchmarks comparing cached vs non-cached template processing

subtasks.title: Refactor template processing to single-pass variable substitution
subtasks.description: Replace the current multi-pass template processing (conditional blocks first, then variables) with a single-pass algorithm that processes all template elements in one iteration
subtasks.details: Modify the substituteVariables() and processConditionalBlocks() methods in TemplateEngine to use a single-pass algorithm. Implement a state machine that can handle both variable substitution and conditional block processing simultaneously while maintaining proper nesting. Use the compiled regex patterns from subtask 1 and ensure the processing maintains the current functionality for both {{variable}} and {{#conditional}}...{{/conditional}} syntax.
subtasks.testStrategy: Functional correctness tests comparing single-pass vs multi-pass output, performance benchmarks measuring processing time improvements, and edge case testing for nested conditional blocks

subtasks.title: Add comprehensive performance benchmarks for template operations
subtasks.description: Create performance benchmark suite to measure and compare template processing performance across different complexity levels and optimization strategies
subtasks.details: Create benchmark test files in packages/tm-core/src/modules/git/services/ that measure template processing performance for various scenarios: simple templates (1-5 variables), medium complexity (5-15 variables with conditionals), and complex templates (15+ variables with nested conditionals). Include benchmarks for template compilation time, rendering time, cache hit rates, and memory usage. Compare performance before and after optimizations using different dataset sizes.
subtasks.testStrategy: Performance regression tests ensuring optimizations provide measurable improvements, memory leak detection for cache usage, and CI integration for performance monitoring

subtasks.title: Integrate optimizations with existing template engine usage
subtasks.description: Update all existing TemplateEngine usage throughout the codebase to leverage the new optimized template processing while maintaining backward compatibility
subtasks.details: Review and update TemplateEngine usage in commit-message-generator.ts and other modules to use the optimized template processing. Ensure backward compatibility with existing template syntax and functionality. Add migration path for any breaking changes and update relevant documentation. Verify that the cache invalidation works correctly when templates are updated via setTemplate() method.
subtasks.testStrategy: Integration tests ensuring all existing template functionality works with optimizations, backward compatibility tests, and end-to-end tests for commit message generation performance

tasks.title: Implement Git Command Batching and Process Pool
tasks.description: Optimize git operations in git-adapter.ts by implementing command batching and process pooling to reduce git command overhead
tasks.details: Enhance packages/tm-core/src/modules/git/adapters/git-adapter.ts to batch multiple git commands and maintain a pool of git processes. Implement command queuing for sequential operations that can be combined. Add process lifecycle management with cleanup on shutdown. Maintain existing git operation reliability while improving performance for multiple sequential commands.
tasks.testStrategy: Performance benchmarks for git operation batching. Integration tests with real git repositories. Process resource monitoring and cleanup verification. Error handling tests for git command failures.

subtasks.title: Design Git Command Batching Architecture
subtasks.description: Design the architecture for batching git commands to reduce process overhead and improve performance for sequential operations
subtasks.details: Analyze existing git-adapter.ts methods to identify operations that can be batched (status checks, multiple commits, branch operations). Design a command queue system that can group compatible git operations and execute them efficiently. Define interfaces for GitCommandBatch, GitBatchExecutor, and GitCommandQueue. Consider which operations are safe to batch vs those requiring immediate execution.
subtasks.testStrategy: Unit tests for batch design interfaces and command grouping logic

subtasks.title: Implement Git Process Pool Manager
subtasks.description: Create a process pool manager to maintain long-lived git processes and reduce spawn overhead
subtasks.details: Implement GitProcessPool class that maintains a pool of SimpleGit instances with configurable pool size. Add process lifecycle management including spawn, reuse, cleanup, and shutdown. Implement process health checking and automatic replacement of failed processes. Add connection pooling for git operations with proper resource cleanup on GitAdapter destruction.
subtasks.testStrategy: Unit tests for process pool lifecycle, resource management, and process health monitoring. Integration tests with real git operations.

subtasks.title: Implement Command Queue and Batching Logic
subtasks.description: Create the command queuing system that can batch compatible git operations for efficient execution
subtasks.details: Implement GitCommandQueue that can queue, group, and batch compatible git commands. Add logic to identify which commands can be safely batched (multiple status calls, sequential file staging). Implement command coalescing for rapid successive operations on same targets. Add timeout-based and size-based batch flushing similar to existing WriteQueueManager patterns. Ensure proper error handling and retry logic for failed batches.
subtasks.testStrategy: Unit tests for command batching logic, queue management, and error handling. Performance benchmarks comparing batched vs individual operations.

subtasks.title: Integrate Batching into GitAdapter Methods
subtasks.description: Modify existing GitAdapter methods to use the new batching and process pool infrastructure
subtasks.details: Update GitAdapter constructor to initialize process pool and command queue. Modify high-frequency methods like getStatus(), stageFiles(), and validation operations to use batching when beneficial. Add configuration options to enable/disable batching and control batch sizes. Maintain backward compatibility and ensure all existing functionality works unchanged. Add proper cleanup in destructor to shutdown pools and flush queues.
subtasks.testStrategy: Integration tests ensuring all existing GitAdapter functionality works with batching enabled. Regression tests for edge cases and error conditions.

subtasks.title: Add Performance Monitoring and Metrics
subtasks.description: Implement comprehensive performance monitoring and metrics collection for the git batching system
subtasks.details: Add metrics collection for batch efficiency, process pool utilization, and performance gains. Implement GitBatchMetrics similar to WriteQueueMetrics with batch sizes, queue times, process pool hit rates, and operation throughput. Add methods to retrieve performance metrics from GitAdapter. Include monitoring for process pool health, command queue depth, and batch flush frequency. Add debug logging for performance analysis and troubleshooting.
subtasks.testStrategy: Performance benchmark tests measuring throughput improvements. Unit tests for metrics accuracy. Integration tests validating metrics collection across different git operation patterns.

tasks.title: Implement Short-Circuit Validation Chain Optimization
tasks.description: Optimize validation chains to use short-circuit evaluation and cost-based validator ordering to improve validation performance
tasks.details: Review validation logic in packages/tm-core/src/modules/tasks/services/ and implement short-circuit evaluation. Order validators by execution cost (cheapest first). Stop validation chain on first failure rather than running all validators. Add validation performance metrics and cost profiling for validator operations.
tasks.testStrategy: Performance benchmarks for validation chain execution. Unit tests ensuring validation logic correctness with short-circuiting. Integration tests for complex validation scenarios. Edge case testing for validator ordering and failure handling.

subtasks.title: Create Cost-Based Validator Interface and Profiling Framework
subtasks.description: Design and implement an interface for cost-aware validators with execution time profiling capabilities
subtasks.details: Create ICostAwareValidator interface extending base validation with getCost() and profile() methods. Implement ValidationProfiler class for timing validator execution. Add cost categories (fast/medium/slow) and cost estimation based on operation type. Implement decorator pattern for existing validators to add cost tracking without modification.
subtasks.testStrategy: Unit tests for cost estimation accuracy and profiling metrics. Benchmarks comparing estimated vs actual execution times. Test decorator pattern integration with existing validators.

subtasks.title: Implement Short-Circuit Validation Chain Manager
subtasks.description: Create a validation chain manager that stops execution on first failure and orders validators by cost
subtasks.details: Implement ValidationChainManager class that sorts validators by cost (cheapest first) and uses early termination on first validation error. Add configuration for strict vs warning-only failures. Implement async validator execution with proper error aggregation. Support both sequential and parallel validation modes based on validator independence.
subtasks.testStrategy: Unit tests ensuring early termination behavior. Performance tests measuring execution time reduction. Integration tests with existing TaskLoaderService validation chains.

subtasks.title: Refactor TaskLoaderService to Use Short-Circuit Validation
subtasks.description: Update TaskLoaderService validation methods to use the new cost-ordered short-circuit validation chain
subtasks.details: Replace individual validation method calls in loadAndValidateTask() with ValidationChainManager. Implement cost profiling for existing validators: validateTaskStatus (fast), validateSubtasksExist (fast), validateSubtaskStructure (medium), validateDependencies (slow). Add validation performance metrics collection and logging. Maintain backward compatibility with existing error handling.
subtasks.testStrategy: Integration tests ensuring existing validation behavior is preserved. Performance benchmarks showing validation speed improvement. Unit tests for proper error aggregation and early termination.

subtasks.title: Add Validation Performance Metrics and Monitoring
subtasks.description: Implement comprehensive validation performance tracking and monitoring capabilities
subtasks.details: Create ValidationMetrics class tracking execution times, failure rates, and short-circuit effectiveness per validator type. Add integration with CacheManager for validation result caching based on task content hash. Implement performance dashboard data collection for validation chain optimization. Add configurable performance thresholds and alerting for validation regression detection.
subtasks.testStrategy: Unit tests for metrics collection accuracy. Integration tests with CacheManager for validation result caching. Performance tests ensuring metrics collection overhead is minimal. Mock validation scenarios for testing alerting thresholds.

subtasks.title: Integrate Short-Circuit Validation with Other Services
subtasks.description: Apply short-circuit validation optimization to PhaseValidator and TestResultValidator services
subtasks.details: Update PhaseValidator.validatePhase() to use cost-based validation ordering. Apply short-circuit optimization to TestResultValidator phase-specific validations. Add validation caching for repeated test result validations. Implement cross-service validation metrics aggregation. Ensure consistent error handling and response format across all validation services.
subtasks.testStrategy: Integration tests across all validation services. Performance benchmarks for workflow validation chains. Unit tests ensuring consistent error format. End-to-end tests with real task validation scenarios.
